comments.how-long-mins: the number of minutes to run, if less than 0 then forever
comments.max-random-send-secs: random number between 0 and max to wait between sending messages (def 2) KEEP IT LOW
comments.session-name: The name of the session to use (def DEFAULT)
comments.cpu: A range to generate values for simulation (def 0 - 100)
comments.mem: A range to generate values for simulation (def 1024 - 8196)
comments.tasks: A range to generate values for simulation (def 0 - 100)
comments.nodes: The number of nodes to simulate for this session (def 5)
